name: comdock
description: COMDOCK is a web application that allows you to view simulated fake company informations.
author: NCS Northware (https://github.com/ncs-northware)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start:win"
scripts.build: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build"
scripts.build:win: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build:win"
scripts.depupdate: concurrently -n ROOT,FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto,auto "npm i" "cd frontend && npm i" "cd backend && npm i"
